contenders.name: SHREDDED
contenders.analysis: LOCK Consistent mid-60s figures (60, 63 back-to-back). Superior to exposed form of rivals. The one to beat.

contenders.name: BEEARETEE
contenders.analysis: Honest placer with 50 speed figure but lacks the winner's gear.

contenders.name: GRAFTING
contenders.analysis: Dunn debutant. Watch betting closely for market confidence.

contenders.name: HOOLEY
contenders.analysis: Needs significant improvement on debut figure of 42.

contenders.name: TIGER TIE
contenders.analysis: LOCK Unexposed Elite potential resuming off a win and strong trial. Gets in light at 56kg - 6kg less than top weight.

contenders.name: SKYWOLF
contenders.analysis: Class runner with 79 speed figure but the 62kg anchor is a serious worry.

contenders.name: DIS IS HEAVEN
contenders.analysis: Fit and honest with 71 speed figure. Place chance.

contenders.name: LADY WARDELL
contenders.analysis: Won well last start but tougher assignment here.

contenders.name: AGENT MAX
contenders.analysis: Improving profile with consistent 60+ figures. Sets the standard in this Class 1 field. 3rd up and peaking.

contenders.name: AUSTRALASIA
contenders.analysis: VALUE PLAY Track winner last start with 58 speed figure. Light weight at 55kg is a big plus.

contenders.name: COCO DREAMING
contenders.analysis: Class dropper but long layoff is a significant risk.

contenders.name: TOPHET
contenders.analysis: Resuming. Watch market for stable confidence.

contenders.name: TACITLY
contenders.analysis: LOCK BEST BET Randwick form with 72 speed figure. Metro Maiden 4th dropping to Country Maiden - definition of 'Class Crush.' Massive edge.

contenders.name: CHIEF OF STAFF
contenders.analysis: Solid provincial form with 59 speed figure. The Quinella horse.

contenders.name: FIREY TRUTH
contenders.analysis: Lees runner with 61 speed figure. Room to improve.

contenders.name: ANDROS
contenders.analysis: Perennial maiden with 48 speed figure. Place at best.

contenders.name: THE ROOKIE
contenders.analysis: Best of a depleted bunch with 55 speed figure. Default selection after 6 scratchings.

contenders.name: TRIBBIANI
contenders.analysis: Inconsistent but rates 2nd best on 52 speed figure.

contenders.name: ABSOLUTELYSMASHING
contenders.analysis: Resuming with 45 speed figure. Needs to lift.

contenders.name: BEE SUN
contenders.analysis: First starter. Watch betting for stable confidence.

contenders.name: TIETAR
contenders.analysis: Consistent figures in the 65-70 range. Proven at this level and meets a field of non-winners.

contenders.name: ALDEENAARY
contenders.analysis: Class dropper with 65 speed figure but hard to trust.

contenders.name: FIVE RINGS
contenders.analysis: Honest stayer's run with 67 speed figure.

contenders.name: VERMEER
contenders.analysis: Racing well with 68 speed figure. Place chance.

contenders.name: HURSTVILLE ZAGREB
contenders.analysis: LOCK Saturday Metro form dropping to Country Cup with 88 speed figure. Class differential overcomes weight. The clear class horse.

contenders.name: TRIBECA STAR
contenders.analysis: Strong Eagle Farm form with 87 speed figure. Main danger.

contenders.name: CAPE CRUSADER
contenders.analysis: VALUE PLAY Chasing hat-trick with 68 speed figure. Dangerous with light weight at 54kg.

contenders.name: EDITED BY
contenders.analysis: Top rater on 92 speed figure but 62kg top weight makes it very hard.

contenders.name: OVAL OFFICE
contenders.analysis: Career-best 68 first-up. Natural improvement second-up makes him the horse to beat in scratched-down field.

contenders.name: THE TORQUE XPRESS
contenders.analysis: Won last start with 67 speed figure. The danger.

contenders.name: VALOURI
contenders.analysis: Nice maiden win with 63 speed figure but harder here.

contenders.name: THUNDEROUS
contenders.analysis: Needs to improve on 57 speed figure.
